name: Baby Professional Interview
description: Cynical reporter interviews an optimistic baby about their tough late-night job

visual_core.description: {interview_location}, a cynical female reporter interviews a happy-go-lucky baby in a {uniform}, {scene_detail}. {background_atmosphere}. No subtitles.
visual_core.style: cinematic, professional journalism aesthetic, with realistic urban environment
visual_core.camera: handheld-style medium shot on the reporter, then a stable close-up on the baby

timeline.action: The female reporter, looking unimpressed by the city bustle, asks her question with a jaded tone.
The baby, full of energy, bounces slightly and answers with genuine excitement.

voiceover.style: A world-weary, slightly jaded female reporter's voice.
An excited, carefree, and energetic baby's voice.

metadata.interview_location: Outside a bustling restaurant district at night, with delivery bikes parked nearby
metadata.background_atmosphere: busy food delivery hub with warm restaurant lights glowing in windows
metadata.lighting_style: warm restaurant lighting mixed with street lamps, creating a cozy urban food scene
metadata.default_reporter_question: Still delivering food this late, this job must be really tough, huh?
metadata.default_baby_response: Not tough at all! I love riding around the city, it's super cool!

metadata.uniform: tiny taxi driver uniform with cap
metadata.interview_location: At a busy transportation hub at night, with taxis and ride-share vehicles waiting
metadata.background_atmosphere: urban pickup zone with passengers coming and going, city traffic flowing
metadata.lighting_style: bright street lighting and taxi headlights creating dynamic urban travel atmosphere
metadata.default_reporter_question: Driving strangers around all day, isn't it exhausting?
metadata.default_baby_response: No way! I meet so many interesting people and explore new places!

metadata.uniform: tiny hoodie with tech company logo
metadata.scene_detail: sitting on a wheeled office chair with a tiny laptop
metadata.interview_location: Outside a modern tech campus at night, with glass office buildings and coding bootcamp signs
metadata.background_atmosphere: silicon valley tech hub with startup offices still lit up, coffee shops with wifi signs
metadata.lighting_style: cool blue LED lighting from office buildings mixed with warm coffee shop lights
metadata.default_reporter_question: Coding all night with those deadlines, must be stressful, right?
metadata.default_baby_response: It's like playing with digital LEGOs! I love building cool stuff!

metadata.uniform: tiny business suit with loose tie
metadata.scene_detail: standing on a skateboard holding a toy phone
metadata.interview_location: In front of the stock exchange at night, with financial district skyscrapers and trading screens visible
metadata.background_atmosphere: wall street financial district with LED stock tickers, suited professionals with phones
metadata.lighting_style: dramatic financial district lighting with green and red LED screens reflecting market data
metadata.default_reporter_question: The market's been brutal lately, how do you handle the pressure?
metadata.default_baby_response: It's just like playing a video game! Red and green numbers are fun!

metadata.scene_detail: posing on a scooter with a ring light
metadata.interview_location: At a trendy Instagram-worthy location at night, with colorful murals and people taking selfies
metadata.background_atmosphere: hip social media hotspot with influencers posing, neon art installations, and ring lights everywhere
metadata.lighting_style: vibrant social media lighting with ring lights, colorful neon installations, and phone camera flashes
metadata.default_reporter_question: Creating content 24/7, doesn't it feel like you never have privacy?
metadata.default_baby_response: Every day is an adventure! I love sharing my fun moments with everyone!

metadata.interview_location: Outside the hospital emergency entrance at night, with ambulance lights and medical staff rushing around
metadata.background_atmosphere: busy hospital emergency area with ambulances, medical personnel, and urgent care activity
metadata.lighting_style: sterile hospital lighting mixed with red ambulance emergency lights creating a heroic medical atmosphere
metadata.default_reporter_question: Working the ER night shift, dealing with emergencies, how do you cope?
metadata.default_baby_response: I get to be a superhero! Helping people feel better is the best feeling ever!

reporter_question.label: Reporter's Question
reporter_question.default: Still delivering food this late, this job must be really tough, huh?

baby_response.label: Baby's Response
baby_response.default: Not tough at all! I love riding around the city, it's super cool!
